Rules.InvariantScript:
Switch(true,
    IsBlank(Self.Text),
    false,
    !IsBlank(varNewVendorHeader.Vendor) && Self.Text = varNewVendorHeader.Vendor,
    false,
    true
)

If(
    Or(
        IsEmpty(colVendorPaymentSearchResults),
        varIsProcessing
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display vendor payment search result items based upon whether filters results further and/or by sort column selected
With(
    {
        searchResults: If(
            IsBlank(txtVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsCommandBarFilter.Text),//If additional filter text not entered, then just display results
            colVendorPaymentSearchResults,
            Search(//Otherwise, search on cached results based upon entered text
                colVendorPaymentSearchResults,
                txtVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsCommandBarFilter.Text,
                "Payment",
                "Vendor",
                "_VendorName",
                "DueDate",
                "Status",
                "FiscalYear",
                "Company"
            )
        )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        searchResults,
        Switch(
            varVendorPaymentSearchAllSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnconVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderPaymentNumber.Text,
            "Payment",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderVendor.Text,
            "Vendor",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderDueDate.Text,
            "DueDate",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderStatus.Text,
            "Status",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderCompanyCode.Text,
            "Company",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderAmount.Text,
            "Amount",
            btnVendorPaymentSearchAllResultsTableHeaderVendorName.Text,
            "_VendorName"
        ),
        varVendorPaymentSearchAllSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

Rule.InvariantScript: conVendorPaymentSearchAllFooter.Height +  conVendorPaymentSearchAllResults.LayoutMinHeight + conVendorPaymentSearchAllFields.Height + conVendorPaymentSearchButtons.Height + Self.PaddingTop + Self.PaddingBottom + Self.LayoutGap * 2 + 10

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display recent search result items sorting according to table header buttons selected and searched on further based upon filter text input
With(
    {
        recentItems: If(
            IsBlank(txtVendorPaymentRecentlySearchedCommandBarFilter.Text),//Filter text not entered
            Filter(
            'SAP Search Histories',
            'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
            'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.'Vendor Payment'
        ),
            Search(//Search on text entered in filtered field
                Filter(
            'SAP Search Histories',
            'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
            'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.'Vendor Payment'//Filter on object type goods receipt
        ),
                txtVendorPaymentRecentlySearchedCommandBarFilter.Text,
                "mpa_name",
                "mpa_objectid"
            )
        )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        recentItems,
        Switch(
            varRecentlySearchedSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnVendorPaymentRecentlySearchedTableHeaderPayment.Text,
            "mpa_name",
            btnVendorPaymentRecentlySearchedTableHeaderLastSearched.Text,
            "mpa_lastsearchedon"
        ),
        varRecentlySearchedSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

!IsEmpty(
    Filter(
        'SAP Search Histories',
        'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
        'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.'Vendor Payment'//Filter on object type vendor payment
    )
)
